/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, filled with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, trees can be seen lining the street, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of the city.
